title: Project-Based Leadership Course for Understanding Cultural Differences in Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A collaborative problem-solving environment in mathematics, where learners from diverse cultural backgrounds use smartphone-based tools for project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply at least three online collaboration strategies considering cultural differences.
In project-based learning, learners can improve math problem-solving efficiency by over 20% using a peer feedback system.
In a four-week+ collaborative project using smartphone-based tools, learners practice sociocultural constructivist learning strategies to complete deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
